{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3492078,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T00:11:51.642Z","cooked":"

We are trying to use 120-degree camera with Photonvision.

The camera is Arducam B0310

We connected it to RPi 4B.

When the driver is configured for imx708, the Photonvision starts, but the camera is not in a WIDE mode.
When the driver is set to imx708_wide, the Photonvision does not start.

Any place to look for the logs? Any idea why it would not start?

We had to modify /boot/firmware/config.txt and disable auto-detect for the camera to be recognized.

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T00:12:38.978Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":24,"reads":145,"readers_count":144,"score":154.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Alex Tsekhansky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3492124,"name":"Chris Gerth","username":"gerthworm","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T01:56:59.444Z","cooked":"
atsekhan:

Arducam B0310

Unfortunately, I don’t believe anyone has tested that combo.

SSH’ing into the coprocessor, going to /opt/photonvision, stopping any running instance with sudo systemctl stop photonvision.service, and then running it manually with sudo java -jar photonvision.jar might be the fastest way to see more info about what is occurring.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T01:56:59.444Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":124,"readers_count":123,"score":34.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://docs.photonvision.org/en/v2025.1.1/docs/hardware/selecting-hardware.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Selecting Hardware - PhotonVision Docs","clicks":5}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/2","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492172,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T03:14:37.111Z","cooked":"

Do you know what directory the photonvision stores logs, by any chance?

I was also wondering if anyone tested any wide cameras (120 degree FOV) with Photonvision so far?

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T03:14:37.111Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":104,"readers_count":103,"score":25.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Alex Tsekhansky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":24617,"username":"gerthworm","name":"Chris Gerth","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/3","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492192,"name":"Chris Gerth","username":"gerthworm","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T03:55:00.577Z","cooked":"
atsekhan:

Do you know what directory the photonvision stores logs, by any chance?

XY question. Check out journalctl if you are curious.

I gave the instructions for a specific reason: to view stdout and stderr as they are produced, without having to worry about the specifics of the systemd logging system in your particular situation.

I do not have a specific answer of which folder to look in for the info you seek.

atsekhan:

I was also wondering if anyone tested any wide cameras (120 degree FOV) with Photonvision so far?

The most literal answer is “Yes, and wide FOV lenses are not recommended for most use cases”. However, I worry this does not speak to the underlying reason you asked the question?

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T03:55:00.577Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":104,"readers_count":103,"score":25.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.freedesktop.org/software/systemd/man/latest/journalctl.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"journalctl","clicks":3}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/4","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492195,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T04:08:08.638Z","cooked":"

In our case the camera cannot be easily moved far back. So they really need to be about 9" from an apriltag and need to be able to recognize that it’s looking at one. It MAY be possible to install cameras high and point down. That way the distance will be greater and everything will fit. In any case - larger FOV will allow us to have cameras closer to the robot perimeter, which will be highly beneficial.

The specific use case - we want to be able to see apriltag and recognize it if if we’re flat against the reef with the bumper, so we can do automatic lateral move to be exactly at the right place to put the coral on the reef.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T04:08:08.638Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":90,"readers_count":89,"score":23.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Alex Tsekhansky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":24617,"username":"gerthworm","name":"Chris Gerth","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492198,"name":"Chris Gerth","username":"gerthworm","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T04:15:38.037Z","cooked":"

The main issue I will reinforce a caution against - as documented here, Photonvision is not well-validated against fisheye lens models.

While it might “happen to work fine” in your particular situation, the documentation explicitly advises against high-FOV cameras for apriltag detection. The mathematical models used to extrapolate 2d into 3d have not yet been configured to account for high FOV lenses.

As a point of clarity, camera FOV is a function of physical sensor size and lens. Orthogonally, PhotonVision crashing on init is much more likely tied to the CSI interface , the specific coprocessor, and sensor chipset, which (again, as documented) is an untested permutation.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T04:17:17.404Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":5,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":84,"readers_count":83,"score":21.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://docs.photonvision.org/en/latest/docs/hardware/selecting-hardware.html#cameras-attributes","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Selecting Hardware - PhotonVision Docs","clicks":1}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":50762,"username":"atsekhan","name":"Alex Tsekhansky","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/6","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492216,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T04:46:08.026Z","cooked":"

Thanks!
I totally understand. We’re very results-oriented, so we simply want to find a solution that works for our specific use case (close-range-only). We will have additional cameras with more “normal” FOV that will be used to track mid-range location of the bot.
We plan to have close to 5 cameras on the bot this year

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T04:46:08.026Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":75,"readers_count":74,"score":20.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Alex Tsekhansky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":24617,"username":"gerthworm","name":"Chris Gerth","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492217,"name":"Matt","username":"thatmattguy","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/thatmattguy/{size}/222358_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T04:48:13.254Z","cooked":"

Just note that results-oriented doesn’t give you license to not do any validation knowing which tradeoffs to make is the Hard Part of Engineering.

Without kernel logs (have you tried our libcamera troubleshooting steps?) I’m not sure if I have specific advice here sorry.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T04:48:13.254Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":7,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":74,"readers_count":73,"score":19.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Matt","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":50762,"username":"atsekhan","name":"Alex Tsekhansky","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":37738,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/8","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492221,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T05:00:44.424Z","cooked":"

Yes, we plan to do substantial testing of the setup on our demo board before we even put it on the robot.
I did try the libcamera troubleshooting steps, and it indeed seems something related to the OS trying to recognize it. But since the time is short and the team has much to do, we accepted that we need to use a different camera and move on Troubleshooting this may make a good summer project, but for now we focus on just making things work.
Thanks much for looking into it. I can let you know the results of the testing with the other cameras for our use-case if you’re interested.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T05:00:44.424Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":8,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":73,"readers_count":72,"score":19.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Alex Tsekhansky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":37738,"username":"thatmattguy","name":"Matt","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/thatmattguy/{size}/222358_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492314,"name":"viggy96","username":"viggy96","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/viggy96/{size}/252784_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T14:31:33.634Z","cooked":"

Are you trying to use this camera for AprilTag pose estimation or just for driver vision?

Because I don’t believe that PhotonVision can properly calibrate cameras with wide angle lenses.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T14:31:33.634Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":58,"readers_count":57,"score":16.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"viggy96","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24613,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"418 Mentor | Tries to be smart"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/10","custom_user_title":"418 Mentor | Tries to be smart","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492528,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-25T19:12:21.176Z","cooked":"

Apriltag pose estimation. However, determining angle to the center of the tag may be sufficient with two cameras and a distance sensor.
PhotonVision documentation specifies recommendation at 100 diagonal FOV for AT detection anyway

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-25T19:12:21.176Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":44,"readers_count":43,"score":13.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"Alex Tsekhansky","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":24613,"username":"viggy96","name":"viggy96","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/viggy96/{size}/252784_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":50762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/11","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492741,"name":"viggy96","username":"viggy96","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/viggy96/{size}/252784_2.png","created_at":"2025-01-26T00:01:41.211Z","cooked":"

Yeah super wide angle lenses tend to have a relatively significant amount of distortion, which PhotonVision’s calibration process isn’t designed to handle properly.

Also, when a super wide angle shot is undistorted, the resulting image is “squished”, making features like AprilTags in the image even smaller and harder for the detection algorithm to pick them out, and you’ll end up needing a higher resolution camera to kinda make up for this aspect.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":13,"updated_at":"2025-01-26T00:01:41.211Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":11,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":40,"readers_count":39,"score":23.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":483470,"topic_slug":"photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start","display_username":"viggy96","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":50762,"username":"atsekhan","name":"Alex Tsekhansky","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24613,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"418 Mentor | Tries to be smart"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-2025-wide-camera-causes-photonvision-not-to-start/483470/12","custom_user_title":"418 Mentor | Tries to be smart","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3492752,"name":"Alex Tsekhansky","username":"atsekhan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/a/0ea827/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-01-26T00:22:57.755Z","cooked":"

Update (if you’re interested) - we did some testing today.

The camera angle is HFOV 115 degrees. And there is indeed quite a bit of distortion. HOWEVER, to my great surprise it appears that the angle determination to the center of the Apriltag from the camera “straight” direction is correct!!!

That is sufficient for us to triangulate the AT position with two cameras, and with the laser distance measurer also pointing straight, will also give me the exact position of the bot in the camera space. We did the math for all that today.

We will be verifying our findings as they seem a bit too good to be true. However, it seems with the cameras located at the exact horizontal level of the Apriltag from the floor and looking straight, we can have a HUGE area coverage (around 20 inches horizontal line) at a VERY short distance (6-9 inches) from the Apriltag.

Basically that allows us to see reef side Apriltag with just two cameras located relatively close to the edge of the bot if we’re touching the reef with the bumper, no matter where we are at the reef.
